mainText:
Dear Steve,
I have wanted to meet you.
A legend from my first byte.
Chose a fruit for name, with knowledge of good and evil 
Painted as a rogue. Betrayed by a friend.
Seeking an answer. Yet destiny bade.
Returned as a saviour, tendered the tree. 
Spring returned. Summer came.
Dreams came true. Back to the throne.
Legend reborn. You are the one.
Steve Jobs you will be missed.
My condolences to your loved ones.
Warmest Regards
header: He is a legend from the beginning to the end.
author: WeiPing
